title: 10 featured Senior Architect and Designer jobs in Los Angeles
author: Nathaniel Bahadursingh
excerpt: If you're an experienced professional ready for a new architectural career opportunity in Los Angeles, this newest edition of our curated job picks from Archinect Jobs is for you. Look below at this selection of 10 featured employers looking to expand with exciting senior architect and designer...
text: If you're an experienced professional ready for a new architectural career opportunity in Los Angeles, this newest edition of our curated job picks from Archinect Jobs is for you. Look below at this selection of 10 featured employers looking to expand with exciting senior architect and designer roles. To explore specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series. Also, follow our Archinect Tips series to improve your portfolio, resume, and interviewing skills, to increase your overall chances of getting that next job. Morphosis Architects seeks a Senior Architect / Project Manager in Culver City"Morphosis is seeking a highly experienced Senior Architect / Project Manager to join our dynamic team in Culver City. This role requires seamless integration into a fast-paced, collaborative studio environment and involves close coordination with a project Partner on complex, high-profile projects." Qualifications include eight to ten years of experience with complex commercial or institutional projects, expert-level proficiency with Revit, strong proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite, and strong communication skills. The firm is also hiring for a Designer / Job Captain. Mark Haddawy Inc. seeks a Senior Architectural Designer in Los Angeles"This role is responsible for producing drawings and renderings quickly and with keen attention to detail, while overseeing the work of Junior Designers." Qualifications include proficiency with Rhino and AutoCAD and/or SketchUp Pro, as well as a strong combination of education and professional experience in architectural design. The Steve McQueen Residence by Mark Haddawy.Grimshaw seeks a Senior Architect in Los Angeles"We are seeking highly skilled Senior Architects and project leaders experienced in the planning, design and execution of complex projects to join our New York and Los Angeles studios. As a key member of our team, you will demonstrate exceptional communication skills, leadership, and professionalism. Collaboration, reliability, and accountability for meeting deadlines and delivering high-quality work are paramount. Your proactive approach will focus on design, project delivery, and exceeding client and firm-wide expectations." The firm is also hiring for a number of roles. Laney LA seeks a Senior Associate in Hermosa BeachQualifications include eight to fifteen years of experience in high-end residential projects at all phases of the project life cycle, deep expertise in construction documentation, a working knowledge of ArchiCAD, a knowledge of California Building Codes, experience leading teams, and excellent written and verbal communication skills. The firm is also hiring for an Associate. WK Residence by Laney LA.Harvest Architecture seeks a Senior Designer in South Pasadena"We are seeking a full-time Senior Design with outstanding design, organization and production skills who is passionate about great architecture and willing to break the mold — because that's how we are." Qualifications include a minimum of five to seven years of experience, skills with AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and Microsoft Office, along with experience as a team leader and mentor. The firm is also hiring for a Junior Designer and an Intermediate Designer. OPEN OFFICE seeks a Senior Project Architect/Designer in Culver City"OPEN OFFICE is seeking to hire a Senior Project Architect/Designer who will work as part of a team, leading the management and production needs of multiple projects from design through construction administration. We are looking for an applicant that is self-motivated and effective in communicating with project teams and consultants. Applicants must be well organized and able to identify and execute the tasks required to meet projects schedules." The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect/Designer. Summit View Supportive Veterans' Housing by Practice.Practice seeks a Senior Project Architect/Design Lead in Pasadena"We have an exciting opportunity for a Senior Project Architect / Design Lead to help lead and develop creative design concepts and strategies on multiple projects. You will have a strong design aesthetic; be able to provide thought leadership; have a passion for creating beautiful, critically oriented work; and an ability to mentor staff - working both collaboratively and independently." The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect, a Project Captain, and a Project Designer II. Martyn Lawrence Bullard Design seeks a Senior Interior Architect – Luxury Residential & Hospitality in Los Angeles"We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Interior Architect with a strong background in luxury residential and hospitality design. The ideal candidate will lead projects from concept to completion, ensuring design excellence, technical precision, and seamless execution. This role requires collaboration with clients, consultants, and internal teams to bring visionary designs to life." CMC Kravis Center by KGM Architectural Lighting.KGM Architectural Lighting seeks a Senior Lighting Designer in El Segundo"You’ll lead the design, planning, and execution of projects, work directly with senior leadership, and represent KGM Lighting in both client meetings and industry events." HansonLA seeks a Senior Project Architect in Los Angeles"HansonLA is currently seeking a Project Architect with 10+ years’ experience and demonstrated leadership skills to join our growing team. The appropriate candidate will be proactive, self-motivated, and will have the capability to work efficiently within a collaborative studio. This is an advanced position at HansonLA and is responsible for project management and delivery. As a project lead, the PA will effectively move projects forward, lead the internal team, coordinate with consultants, and develop all items agreed to in the contract." The firm is also hiring for an Intermediate Architect. If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
html:
If you're an experienced professional ready for a new architectural career opportunity in Los Angeles, this newest edition of our curated job picks from Archinect Jobs is for you. Look below at this selection of 10 featured employers looking to expand with exciting senior architect and designer roles.

To explore specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series. Also, follow our Archinect Tips series to improve your portfolio, resume, and interviewing skills, to increase your overall chances of getting that next job.

Morphosis Architects seeks a Senior Architect / Project Manager in Culver City
"Morphosis is seeking a highly experienced Senior Architect / Project Manager to join our dynamic team in Culver City. This role requires seamless integration into a fast-paced, collaborative studio environment and involves close coordination with a project Partner on complex, high-profile projects." Qualifications include eight to ten years of experience with complex commercial or institutional projects, expert-level proficiency with Revit, strong proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite, and strong communication skills.

The firm is also hiring for a Designer / Job Captain.

Mark Haddawy Inc. seeks a Senior Architectural Designer in Los Angeles
"This role is responsible for producing drawings and renderings quickly and with keen attention to detail, while overseeing the work of Junior Designers." Qualifications include proficiency with Rhino and AutoCAD and/or SketchUp Pro, as well as a strong combination of education and professional experience in architectural design.

Grimshaw seeks a Senior Architect in Los Angeles
"We are seeking highly skilled Senior Architects and project leaders experienced in the planning, design and execution of complex projects to join our New York and Los Angeles studios. As a key member of our team, you will demonstrate exceptional communication skills, leadership, and professionalism. Collaboration, reliability, and accountability for meeting deadlines and delivering high-quality work are paramount. Your proactive approach will focus on design, project delivery, and exceeding client and firm-wide expectations."

The firm is also hiring for a number of roles.

Laney LA seeks a Senior Associate in Hermosa Beach
Qualifications include eight to fifteen years of experience in high-end residential projects at all phases of the project life cycle, deep expertise in construction documentation, a working knowledge of ArchiCAD, a knowledge of California Building Codes, experience leading teams, and excellent written and verbal communication skills.

The firm is also hiring for an Associate.

Harvest Architecture seeks a Senior Designer in South Pasadena
"We are seeking a full-time Senior Design with outstanding design, organization and production skills who is passionate about great architecture and willing to break the mold — because that's how we are." Qualifications include a minimum of five to seven years of experience, skills with AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and Microsoft Office, along with experience as a team leader and mentor.

The firm is also hiring for a Junior Designer and an Intermediate Designer.

OPEN OFFICE seeks a Senior Project Architect/Designer in Culver City
"OPEN OFFICE is seeking to hire a Senior Project Architect/Designer who will work as part of a team, leading the management and production needs of multiple projects from design through construction administration. We are looking for an applicant that is self-motivated and effective in communicating with project teams and consultants. Applicants must be well organized and able to identify and execute the tasks required to meet projects schedules."

The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect/Designer.

Practice seeks a Senior Project Architect/Design Lead in Pasadena
"We have an exciting opportunity for a Senior Project Architect / Design Lead to help lead and develop creative design concepts and strategies on multiple projects. You will have a strong design aesthetic; be able to provide thought leadership; have a passion for creating beautiful, critically oriented work; and an ability to mentor staff - working both collaboratively and independently."

The firm is also hiring for a Project Architect, a Project Captain, and a Project Designer II.

Martyn Lawrence Bullard Design seeks a Senior Interior Architect – Luxury Residential & Hospitality in Los Angeles
"We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Interior Architect with a strong background in luxury residential and hospitality design. The ideal candidate will lead projects from concept to completion, ensuring design excellence, technical precision, and seamless execution. This role requires collaboration with clients, consultants, and internal teams to bring visionary designs to life."

KGM Architectural Lighting seeks a Senior Lighting Designer in El Segundo
"You’ll lead the design, planning, and execution of projects, work directly with senior leadership, and represent KGM Lighting in both client meetings and industry events."

HansonLA seeks a Senior Project Architect in Los Angeles
"HansonLA is currently seeking a Project Architect with 10+ years’ experience and demonstrated leadership skills to join our growing team. The appropriate candidate will be proactive, self-motivated, and will have the capability to work efficiently within a collaborative studio. This is an advanced position at HansonLA and is responsible for project management and delivery. As a project lead, the PA will effectively move projects forward, lead the internal team, coordinate with consultants, and develop all items agreed to in the contract."

The firm is also hiring for an Intermediate Architect.

If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
